title: Build and Run in Ubuntu
body:
Try to build it inside Ubuntu 14.04 as follows:
cd hack-disrupt
npm install grunt bower express
npm install
grunt  ---> nope, grunt wont run
node sever/app.js
get errors below:

/var/www/html/site4/hack-disrupt/server/config/seed.js:15
Definition.find({}).remove(() => {
                            ^
SyntaxError: Unexpected token )
    at Module._compile (module.js:439:25)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:474:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:312:12)
    at Module.require (module.js:364:17)
    at require (module.js:380:17)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/var/www/html/site4/hack-disrupt/server/app.js:22:21)
    at Module._compile (module.js:456:26)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:474:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:312:12)
    at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:497:10)
    at startup (node.js:119:16)
    at node.js:902:3

Any help!

God blesses!!!
Best regards,
Sanyaade
